item.title: Baked Mac n' Cheese
item.description: Variations Can include chopped green chile, jalapenos, or bacon for an interesting spin on the classic. Ingredients Casserole Ingredients 4 cups hot, cooked elbow macaroni (roughly 1/2 pound uncooked) 2 cups (8 oz) shredded sharp cheddar 1 cup cottage cheese 3/4 cup sour cream 1/2 cup skim milk 2 tablespoons grated onion 1 1/2 teaspoon butter or margarine, melted 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1 large egg, beaten Topping Ingredients 1/4 cup bread crumbs 1 tablespoon butter or margarine 1/4 teaspoon paprika Directions Preheat oven to 350Â°.
